Module src
Package BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.Client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.Client.Client
public class Client extends Object
Represents a client that connects to the game server. This class has methods for the client to interact with the server and recieve information from the server.
Author:
Ali Kaan Uysal, Bas Van Dijk

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Client object with the server address and port.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(String address, int port) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Client object with the server address and port. Sets the listeners and creates a client connection.
      Parameters:
      address - The IP address or hostname of the server.
      port - The port number to connect to on the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while establishing the connection.

  • Method Details

    • setGUIListener

      public void setGUIListener(ClientListenerGUI listener)
      Sets the GUI listener for handling client events.
      Parameters:
      listener - The GUI listener to set.

    • setAIPlayer

      public void setAIPlayer()
      Sets the AI player for the client. This method initializes the AI player and sets the human player to null.

    • setHumanPlayer

      public void setHumanPlayer()
      Sets the human player for the client. This method initializes the human player and sets the AI player to null.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the client connection.

    • sendUsername

      public void sendUsername(String username)
      Sends the specified username to the server.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be sent.

    • sendHello

      public void sendHello(String description)
      Sends a "Hello" message to the server. This method sends a formatted "Hello" message to the server containing the client description.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the client.

    • sendList

      public void sendList()
      Sends a "List" command to the server. This method requests the server to send a list of available players.

    • sendQueue

      public void sendQueue()
      Sends a "Queue" command to the server. This method requests the server to put the client in the game queue.

    • sendMove

      public void sendMove(int move)
      Sends a move to the server. This method sends the specified move to the server.
      Parameters:
      move - The move to be sent.

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Returns the username of the client.
      Returns:
      The username of the client.

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(String username)
      Sets the username of the client.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be set.

    • getLogInSuccesfull

      public boolean getLogInSuccesfull()
      Returns whether the login was successful.
      Returns:
      True if the login was successful, false otherwise.

    • getGameover

      public boolean getGameover()
      Returns whether the game is over.
      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • addListener

      public void addListener(ClientListener listener)
      Adds a client listener to the list of listeners.
      Parameters:
      listener - The client listener to be added.

    • reieveHelloCommand

      public void reieveHelloCommand(String serverDescription)
      Receives a "Hello" command from the server. This method prints the server description received as part of the "Hello" command.
      Parameters:
      serverDescription - The description received from the server.

    • recieveListCommand

      public void recieveListCommand(String list)
      Receives a "List" command from the server. This method prints the list of available players received from the server.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of available players received from the server.

    • recieveNewGameCommand

      public void recieveNewGameCommand(String player1Name, String player2Name)
      Receives a "NewGame" command from the server. This method handles the initialization of a new game based on the received player names.
      Parameters:
      player1Name - The name of Player 1.
      player2Name - The name of Player 2.

    • setIsPlayerTurn

      public void setIsPlayerTurn(boolean isPlayerTurn)
      Sets whether it is currently the player's turn.
      Parameters:
      isPlayerTurn - A boolean indicating whether it is the player's turn.

    • getPlayerTurn

      public boolean getPlayerTurn()
      Returns whether it is currently the player's turn.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether it is the player's turn.

    • getGameStarted

      public boolean getGameStarted()
      Returns whether the game has started.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the game has started.

    • getInQueue

      public boolean getInQueue()
      Returns whether the client is currently in a queue.

      A boolean indicating whether the client is in a queue.

      The human player associated with the client.

      Receives a move from the server.
      Parameters:

    • recieveGameOverCommand

      public void recieveGameOverCommand(String reason, String winner)
      Receives a game over command from the server.
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason for the game over.
      winner - The winner of the game.

    • exitGame

      public void exitGame()
      Exits the game, setting gameOver to be false.

      Notifies all listeners when the client disconnects from the server.

    • getOtherPlayerColor

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getOtherPlayerColor()
      Returns the color of the other player based on the current player's color.
      Returns:
      The color of the other player.

    • setPlayerColor

      public void setPlayerColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Sets the color of the player.
      Parameters:

    • getCurrentGamePlayer1Score

      public int getCurrentGamePlayer1Score()
      Returns the current score of player 1 in the ongoing game.
      Returns:
      The current score of player 1.

    • getCurrentGamePlayer2Score

      public int getCurrentGamePlayer2Score()
      Returns the current score of player 2 in the ongoing game.
      Returns:
      The current score of player 2.

    • incrementPlayerScore

      public void incrementPlayerScore(int playerNum, int points)
      Increments the score of the specified player by the given points.
      Parameters:
      playerNum - The number of the player whose score needs to be incremented (1 or 2).
      points - The points to add to the player's score.
